author: wglass
msg: fix misplaced asterisks in comments.  VELOCITY-578.

author: xavier
msg: link to release notes rather than doc home for the beta announcement on site home

author: jacopoc
msg: First step in the implementation of past due date invoices: created a service that computes the due date(s) and outstanding amount(s) based on the Invoice terms; added initial support for multiple payment terms per invoice (e.g. 'pay after 30 days the 50% of the invoice, pay after 60 days the 40%, pay after 90 the 10%').
Modified the getDayEnd util method to be usable in Minilang.

author: slaws
msg: Separate the node method that service the node API from the methods that the domain uses for controlling the node to avoid loops of events
